/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/Communication.summary: Manager for resources of type Communication
/Communication.description: The Manager for resources of type Communication: provides services to manage the collection of all the Communication instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Communication based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Media.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Media

parameters.name: _content

parameters.name: based-on

parameters.description: Who/What this Media is a record of

/Observation.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Observation
/Observation.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Observation

get.summary: Search all resources of type Observation based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _filter
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: Reference to the test or procedure request.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code of the observation type

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique id for a particular observation

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

parameters.name: qualityCode
parameters.description: The quality code of the observation

parameters.name: qualityType
parameters.description: The quality type of the observation

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject that the observation is about

/QuestionnaireResponse.summary: Manager for resources of type QuestionnaireResponse
/QuestionnaireResponse.description: The Manager for resources of type QuestionnaireResponse: provides services to manage the collection of all the QuestionnaireResponse instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type QuestionnaireResponse based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _filter
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: authored
parameters.description: When the questionnaire response was last changed

parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this questionnaire response

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the questionnaire response

parameters.name: qualityCode
parameters.description: The quality code of the questionnaire response

parameters.name: qualityType
parameters.description: The quality type of the questionnaire response

parameters.name: questionnaire
parameters.description: The questionnaire the answers are provided for

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the questionnaire response

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject of the questionnaire response

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
